title: Pilot
synopsis: Unassuming high school chemistry teacher Walter White discovers he has lung cancer. Desperate to secure his family's financial future and finally free from the fear that had always inhibited him, Walt teams up with a former student to turn a used RV into a mobile drug lab.

title: Cat's in the Bag...
synopsis: Walt and Jesse attempt to tie up loose ends. Skyler becomes suspicious of Walt's strange behavior.

title: ...and the Bag's in the River
synopsis: Walt and Jesse clean up Emilio's mess and Walt must face holding up his end of the deal.

title: Cancer Man
synopsis: Walt reveals his cancer at a family barbecue. Jesse goes to visit his family.

title: Gray Matter
synopsis: Walt and Skyler attend the birthday party of an affluent former colleague. Jesse attempts to go straight.

title: Crazy Handful of Nothin'
synopsis: Walt is plagued by the effects of chemotherapy. Skinny Pete makes an introduction and Walt strikes a deal.

title: A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
synopsis: Walt gets comfortable with his new identity. Marie gives Skyler a questionable baby shower gift.

title: Seven Thirty-Seven
synopsis: Walt and Jesse are reminded of Tuco’s volatile nature, and try to figure a way out of their partnership.

title: Grilled
synopsis: Walt and Jesse find themselves in close quarters with an unhinged Tuco. Skyler is distraught over Walt’s disappearance.

title: Bit by a Dead Bee
synopsis: Walt and Jesse cover their tracks. Hank gets a break in his meth investigation.

title: Down
synopsis: Walt tries to reconnect with his family, but Skyler keeps her distance. Jesse finds himself homeless.

title: Breakage
synopsis: Tensions and bills mount at the White house. Hank suffers from his encounter with Tuco. Jesse assembles a crew.

title: Peekaboo
synopsis: Walt returns to work. Skinny Pete gets ripped off and when Jesse steps in, he gets more than he bargained for.

title: Negro y Azul
synopsis: Hank struggles in El Paso. Skyler pursues a new job. Jesse gets to know Jane.

title: Better Call Saul
synopsis: When Badger gets busted, Walt and Jesse seek the legal advice of a shady attorney, Saul Goodman.

title: 4 Days Out
synopsis: The Whites await news about Walt's cancer treatment progress. Walt and Jesse retreat to the desert for a marathon cook.

title: Over
synopsis: Walt and Hank get into a fight, and Walt consumes himself with home improvements. Skyler opens up to her boss, Ted.

title: Mandala
synopsis: Saul proposes a new business partner. Skyler makes a disturbing discovery. Jesse divulges his real profession to Jane.

title: Phoenix
synopsis: Walter, Jr. launches a website to aid his struggling family. Jesse's addiction spirals out of control.

title: ABQ
synopsis: Skyler and Walt collide. Jesse self-destructs after a personal blow. Donald's grief leads to tragedy.

title: No Más
synopsis: Walt deals with the plane crash and Skyler's anger as Jesse comes to a realization. A new threat appears.

title: Caballo Sin Nombre
synopsis: Walt takes drastic action to bring his family back together. With Saul's help, Jesse makes an unexpected investment.

title: I.F.T.
synopsis: Walt ignores Skyler's demands, pushing her to break bad. Hank crosses a line at work.

title: Green Light
synopsis: Walt loses control. Hank throws himself into his blue meth investigation. Jesse enacts a new plan.

title: Más
synopsis: Gus lures Walt back into business, forcing a rift between Walt and Jesse. Skyler doubts her new relationship.

title: Sunset
synopsis: Walt settles into his new surroundings. Hank's investigation creates an immediate problem for Walt and Jesse.

title: One Minute
synopsis: Hank's volatility forces a confrontation with Jesse and trouble at work. Skyler pressures Walt to make a deal.

title: I See You
synopsis: The family waits for news about Hank. While Jesse covers at the lab, Walt attempts to placate Gus.

title: Kafkaesque
synopsis: As Hank's hospital bills mount, Skyler hatches a plan. Walt and Gus come to a better understanding.

title: Fly
synopsis: Walt becomes obsessed with a contaminant in the lab. A frustrated Jesse attempts to get Walt back on track.

title: Abiquiú
synopsis: Skyler gets involved in Walt's business. Hank struggles with recovery. Jesse makes a startling discovery.

title: Half Measures
synopsis: Jesse lashes out. Fearing for Jesse's safety, Walt intervenes. A tragic event leads to a shocking confrontation.

title: Full Measure
synopsis: With Jesse on the run, Walt bargains with Gus and concocts a plan to provide for his and Jesse's safety.

title: Box Cutter
synopsis: Walt and Jesse face the deadly consequences of their actions. Skyler deals with a puzzling disappearance, as Marie struggles to help Hank with his recovery.

title: Thirty-Eight Snub
synopsis: Walt attempts to form a new alliance as he plans his next move. Skyler pushes Walt towards a business opportunity, in hopes of protecting the family.

title: Open House
synopsis: Events spiral out of control at Jesse’s place. Skyler reluctantly asks for Saul’s help. Marie returns to an old pastime and a friend asks Hank for help.

title: Bullet Points
synopsis: The Cartel takes steps to gain the upper hand. Walt and Skyler share an embarrassing secret with the rest of the family. Jesse's activities draw unwanted attention.

title: Shotgun
synopsis: When Jesse goes missing, Walt fears the worst. Skyler has an unlikely reunion. Hank shares some bad news with Detective Tim Roberts.

title: Cornered
synopsis: Skyler makes an unsettling discovery. Walter, Jr. pushes his dad into a questionable purchase. Jesse offers Mike some unexpected help.

title: Problem Dog
synopsis: A frustrated Walt gambles on a risky new plan. Skyler's business venture hits a snag. Hank recruits Walter, Jr. for an unusual outing.

title: Hermanos
synopsis: Skyler develops an unusual solution to her money troubles. Hank enlists Walt to investigate a theory. Walt’s impatience with Jesse grows.

title: Bug
synopsis: Skyler's past mistakes come back to haunt her. Gus takes action to thwart his rivals. Jesse seeks Walt's help, with mixed results.

title: Salud
synopsis: Walt's family worries when he doesn't turn up for Walter, Jr.'s 16th birthday. Jesse is forced to put his lab skills to the test without Mr. White's help.

title: Crawl Space
synopsis: Walt takes drastic action to protect his secret and Gus. Skyler's efforts to solve Ted's financial problems hit a wall.

title: End Times
synopsis: Hank pushes Gomez to pursue one last lead, while Walt struggles to protect the family. Jesse gets alarming news and rushes to meet with Mr. White.

title: Face Off
synopsis: Walt and Jesse team up to take on Gus. With Saul’s help, Walt finds an unexpected ally.

title: Live Free of Die
synopsis: As Walt deals with the aftermath of the Casa Tranquila explosion, Hank works to wrap up his investigation of Gus' empire.

title: Madrigal
synopsis: Walt and Jesse seek out an unlikely partner for a new business venture. The DEA follows up new leads in its investigation.

title: Hazard Pay
synopsis: Walt and Jesse put a business plan into action. Walt confesses a secret to Marie.
